com.qtplaf.library.ai.neural

Class Network.Forward

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.ai.neural.Network.Forward
  • Enclosing class:
    Network

    public static class Network.Forward
extends java.lang.Object
    Data generated when the network processes inputs in a feed forward, composed of:
    • Signals or weighted sums of inputs.
    • Ouputs as a result of applying the activation to the signals.
    Signals and ouputs should be recorded because in the back propagation process the derivative, depending on the activation function, can require the signal or input or the output.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
